name: Lodge Dinner for Your Spouse
description:
Use this button to purchase a dinner for your Spouse for dinners where spouses are invited.  This is a $15.00 cash charge plus $1.00 to cover the cost of PayPal.

Use the Military Gifting button to purchase a child (age 12+) dinner and inform the Junior Warden of the purpose of your "contribution."

Sorry for any inconvenience.

name: Military Gifting Program or Kid's Dinner at Lodge
description:
This button can be used for either a contribution to the Military Gifting Program or a Child's (age 12-18) dinner at Lodge.  Inform the Junior Warden if the money is to be used for a dinner.

The Yonkers Lions Club and Publicity Lodge are in the fourth year of a Military Gifting Program, which assists US military personnel serving in harms way.

Because PXs do not exist in many combat locations, the program acquires hygiene necessities which the troops cannot obtain, such as shampoos, lotions and disinfectants, and snacks such as cookies and hot cocoa mix.  

The program then ships hundreds of cartons to the closest Forward Operations Base, (this year's is in Puli Alam, Afganistan, near the Pakistan Border).  There, a responsible military liaison officer parcels out the shipments to combat outposts either by helicopters or overland vehicles as necessary.

In the first two years, the program sent shipments during the Christmas holiday season.  This year the program is supplying nearly 500 soldiers for the duration of their deployment!

You may use this service to donate $20.00 by credit card through Publicity Lodge's Paypal account, which will be credited immediately to the program.

You may also donate any amount at any time, by sending a check, made out to: 

Yonkers Lions Club (Memo Military Gifting)  

Address it to: 

Richard F. Komosinski
85 Homecrest Oval
Yonkers, NY 10703

Thank you for your support of our troops!

name: Lodge Dues
description:
Now you can pay your Publicity Lodge Dues right here, using your credit card and Paypal.  ($125 lodge + half the $30 GL per capita)

Only a slight surcharge of $4.50 to pay Paypal for the convenience of online payment.

name: Lodge Dinner
description: Use your credit card to RSVP and pay in advance for your Lodge Meeting dinner here.  Only a $1.00 surcharge for total convenience.

name: Publicity Lapel Pin
description:
This antique (!e don't know when they were made, but it was a long time ago!) cloisonne pin features our herald trumpeting with the lodge banner - our classic logo since 1921.

Wear it proudly whenever out in the world.

$5.20  Delivered to you at the next lodge meeting.
